elements.name: Booking an appointment by default search

steps.name: Patient clicks on Book Appointment
chooses Payer Type as "Patient"
Appointment Type as "Consultation"
Patient should be navigated to Appointment filters page and see a message "Please use the filters if you wish to refine your search"

arguments.val: Please use the filters if you wish to refine your search

steps.name: Patient clicks on Search button
Appointment search Results should be displayed
Patient clicks on "1" available appointment details

comments.value: #    Then Patient sees a message "The patient will be charged £35.00 if you cancel the appointment within 1 hours." on Appointment Details page

steps.name: Patient sees a message "The patient will be charged at 10% of the full price plus £50.00 fixed fee if you cancel the appointment within 1 hours." on Appointment Details page

arguments.val: The patient will be charged at 10% of the full price plus £50.00 fixed fee if you cancel the appointment within 1 hours.

comments.value: #Then Appointment Details page should be opened

steps.name: Patient clicks on Book Appointment button on Details Page
Appointment Booking Complete confirmation message "was successfully completed" should be displayed
Patient navigates to Meddbase Patient Portal Login Page

chooses Payer Type as "Patient"

steps.name: Patient clicks on Preferred Clinician
chooses  Preferred Clinician  as "Any Clinician"
Patient clicks on Preferred Site
chooses Preferred Site as "Work location"
Patient clicks on Preferred Time and Date
chooses Preferred Time and Date as "Afternoon"  "30/04/2020"
Patient clicks on Search button
Appointment search Results should be displayed
Patient clicks on "1" available appointment details

steps.name: Patient clicks on Existing Appointments

Patient should be able to view recently Booked Appointments with a message "In the list below you will find your existing appointments. Click on the appointment for more details. If you are able to cancel the appointment, a cancel button will be displayed."
